attributes.action: Leglize cannabis in the uk for medcal purpose
attributes.additional_details: I was in a bad car accident were my seat belt snap and I flew forward I hit the gear stick burst one my bollocks. Carry ed on forward threw windscreen and lsnded 5 metres up the road. I broke nearly every bone in my body apart from my neck and bk. I now suffer bad eperlisey I've very bad pain. I've a bleed on my brain. I really hope we can leglize medcal cannabis oil in the uk . It's gd for many illness cancer eperlisey pain . Stress etc
attributes.background: Hi I want the use off cannabis oil to be legal in the uk  I need this for my very bad pain and eperlisey which I got from a car crash . I have a bleed on my brain and cannabis oil can help mend this
